verses.text: God \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* harbour \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* strength, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* very present help \w in|strong="H5921"\w* trouble.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* this cause \w we|strong="H4672"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w no|strong="H4672"\w* fear, even though \w the|strong="H4672"\w* earth \w is|strong="H0430"\w* changed, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* though \w the|strong="H4672"\w* mountains \w are|strong="H0430"\w* moved \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* heart \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H4672"\w* sea;

Though \w its|strong="H5921"\w* waters \w are|strong="H0776"\w* sounding \w and|strong="H0776"\w* troubled, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* though \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* shaking \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* violent motion. (Selah.)

\w There|strong="H2022"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H2022"\w* river whose streams \w make|strong="H1993"\w* glad \w the|strong="H2022"\w* resting-place \w of|strong="H2022"\w* God, \w the|strong="H2022"\w* holy place \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* tents \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* Most High.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* taken \w his|strong="H0430"\w* \w place|strong="H4908"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* her; she \w will|strong="H0430"\w* not \w be|strong="H0430"\w* moved: \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* come \w to|strong="H0430"\w* her help \w at|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0430"\w* dawn \w of|strong="H0430"\w* morning.

\w The|strong="H6437"\w* nations \w were|strong="H0430"\w* angry, \w the|strong="H6437"\w* kingdoms \w were|strong="H0430"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*; \w at|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6437"\w* sound \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H7130"\w* voice \w the|strong="H6437"\w* earth became \w like|strong="H7130"\w* wax.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H0776"\w* armies \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*; \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w high|strong="H1471"\w* tower. (Selah.)

\w Come|strong="H6635"\w*, see \w the|strong="H3068"\w* works \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* destruction \w which|strong="H6635"\w* \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* made \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w puts|strong="H7760"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* end \w to|strong="H3068"\w* wars \w over|strong="H3068"\w* all \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* bow \w is|strong="H0834"\w* broken, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* spear cut \w in|strong="H3068"\w* two, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* carriage burned \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fire.

\w Be|strong="H0776"\w* \w at|strong="H4421"\w* peace \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* knowledge \w that|strong="H0784"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* am God: \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5704"\w* \w among|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w nations|strong="H0776"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* honoured \w through|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w of|strong="H0776"\w* armies \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Jacob \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* tower. (Selah.)
